quickSteps: Open the TRX→XMR pair and choose the TRX network; see friendly pages at /en/coins/trx and /en/coins/xmr.
Load a quote: Fixed for an exact XMR out-amount with a timer; Floating for live pricing with small variance.
Prepare a fresh XMR receiving address and verify the first/last characters.
Sanity-check address, TRX network, and the quote timer; for larger amounts consider 2–3 parts.
Send TRX within the quote window and verify the expected XMR amount after wallet sync.

seo.title: TRX→XMR: Smart, Private Swaps Made Simple
seo.description: A practical TRX→XMR guide with a unique 5-step checklist and absolute URLs for crawlers.
